name: REFERRAL_3
description: The REFERRAL_3 table is a continuation of the REFERRAL_2 which is continuation of the REFERRAL table. These tables are the primary tables for referral information stored in the system.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_STR_10
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral string item 10.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_CAT_11_C_NAME

columns.name: REFERRING_DEP_SPC_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the specialty of the department where the referral is coming from.
entries: CCM Housing Assistance and Shelter Services
CCM Financial Counseling and Assistance Services
CCM Language and Communication Assistance Services
ReCS <script>alert("This should not show up in a popup!!!");</script>

columns.name: CANCEL_RSN_C_NAME
